sentences.en: bring forward proof.
sentences.cn: 提交证据

sentences.en: bring off a successful advertising campaign.
sentences.cn: 赢得了一场广告战

sentences.en: bring out a new book.
sentences.cn: 出版一本新书

sentences.en: brought on the dessert.
sentences.cn: 端上甜点

sentences.en: brought out the facts.
sentences.cn: 揭露事实

sentences.en: Changing stresses bring about more cracking and rock deformation.
sentences.cn: 不断变化的应力导致更多的断裂和岩石变形。

sentences.en: Did you bring an umbrella?
sentences.cn: 你带伞了吗？

sentences.en: Fill a saucepan with water and bring to a slow boil.
sentences.cn: 往平底锅里加满水，小火煮沸。

sentences.en: I can't bring myself to ditch him and start again.
sentences.cn: 我不忍心蹬掉他再觅新欢。

sentences.en: It was the first time Joey had ever brought a girl home .
sentences.cn: 那是乔伊第一次带女孩子回家。

sentences.en: Many women still take career breaks to bring up children.
sentences.cn: 仍然有许多女性为了抚养孩子而离职。

sentences.en: Only the achievement of these goals will bring lasting peace.
sentences.cn: 只有达成这些目标才会带来持久的和平。

sentences.en: Pain-killers are very useful in small amounts to bring your temperature down.
sentences.cn: 小剂量的止痛药对于降低体温非常有用。

sentences.en: plants bringing forth fruit.
sentences.cn: 结果的植物

sentences.en: Severe shock can bring on an attack of acne.
sentences.cn: 严重的惊吓会造成痤疮突发。

sentences.en: Shares and bonds can bring one quite a considerable additional income.
sentences.cn: 股票和债券能给人带来不菲的额外收入。

sentences.en: The discovery of gold brought thousands of people to the Transvaal.
sentences.cn: 黄金的发现把成千上万的人引到了德兰士瓦。

sentences.en: The expansion of state education brought new and wider opportunities for working class children.
sentences.cn: 公立教育的普及为工人阶层出身的儿童带来了更多新的机会。

sentences.en: The family tried to bring a private prosecution against him for assault.
sentences.cn: 这家人试图以侵犯人身为由对他提起自诉。

sentences.en: The jury took 23 hours to bring in its verdict.
sentences.cn: 陪审团花了23个小时才作出裁决。

sentences.en: The senator’s speech brought an angry response from Civil Rights groups.
sentences.cn: 那名参议员的话引起了一些民权组织的愤怒。

sentences.en: The wood had been recently polished to bring back the shine.
sentences.cn: 木头最近经过抛光又恢复了光泽。

sentences.en: They brought news of further fighting along the border.
sentences.cn: 他们带来消息，说边境再次发生了冲突。

sentences.en: They were anxious to bring the washing in before it rained.
sentences.cn: 他们急于在下雨前把洗好的衣服收进屋子。

sentences.en: They're trying their best to bring together those separated families.
sentences.cn: 他们正尽最大的努力让离散的家人重聚。

sentences.en: Wives will have to bring along their marriage certificate.
sentences.cn: 已婚妇女必须携带结婚证。

sentences.en: You bring out the best in me.
sentences.cn: 你使我把自己最好的方面都发挥出来了

sentences.en: You never can tell what life is going to bring you.
sentences.cn: 你永远不知道人生会给你带来些什么。

words.tran_cn: 带来；促使；引起；使某人处于某种情况或境地

phrases.tran_cn: 拿回来；使…恢复；使…回忆起来
&I{【会计学】} 转入下页，转入下栏：把（数字）转入下页或下栏
生出、产生或挣得（利润，收入）
v. 使开始；使进入某种状态
魅力四射（电影名，又译美少女啦啦队）
深植，教育：教育，培养（例如一种品质）使至最佳境界
&I{【航海】} 使（船）顺着风向，使（船）停驶

trans.tran_cn: 带来，提供，导致，使处于…，起诉，强迫做
trans.tran_en: if something brings people to a place, it makes them go there

trans.tran_cn: 拿来， 带来， 取来
trans.tran_en: to take something or someone with you to the place where you are now, or to the place you are talking about
